item.title: Model Context Protocol (MCP) an overview
item.description: The Model Context Protocol (MCP) is an open standard introduced by Anthropic with the goal to standardize how AI applications (chatbots, IDE assistants, or custom agents) connect with external tools, data sources, and systems.
